description: This table contains member context information for capitation transactions.

columns.name: MEM_LIST_ID
columns.description: The ID of the transaction member list record computed as part of the specialty capitation payment process.

columns.name: EFFECTIVE_DATE
columns.description: The effective date of the specialty capitation payment computation.

columns.name: ELIGIBILITY_DATE
columns.description: The test date used to determine if a member is eligible for inclusion in specialty capitation payment computations.

columns.name: SERV_AREA_ID
columns.description: The ID of the service area that defines the context of the specialty capitation payment computation.

columns.name: CARRIER_ID
columns.description: The ID of the carrier that defines the context of the specialty capitation payment computation.

columns.name: CARRIER_ID_CARRIER_NAME
columns.description: The name of the carrier record.

columns.name: NETWORK_ID
columns.description: The ID of the network that defines the context of the specialty capitation payment computation.

columns.name: NETWORK_ID_NETWORK_NAME
columns.description: The name of the network.

columns.name: BENEFIT_PLAN_ID
columns.description: The ID of the benefit plan that defines the context of the specialty capitation payment computation.

columns.name: BENEFIT_PLAN_ID_BENEFIT_PLAN_NAME
columns.description: The name of the benefit plan record.

columns.name: RKP_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the risk panel for the member.

columns.name: RKP_ID_RISK_PANEL_NAME
columns.description: The name of the risk panel.

columns.name: LOB_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the line of business for the member.

columns.name: LOB_ID_LOB_NAME
columns.description: The name of the line of business record.

columns.name: MGRP_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of member group for the member.

columns.name: MGRP_ID_MEM_GRP_NAME
columns.description: The name of the member group

columns.name: MEM_LIST_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The type of member list that this record represents.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Member List


Addition


Subtraction


Change Addition


Change Subtraction

columns.name: ADJUST_ORIG_LIST_ID
columns.description: The ID of the transaction member list that this list adjusts.

columns.name: LOAD_BATCH_DATE
columns.description: The date that the member list was loaded into the system.

columns.name: ASSOC_EXT_VAL_C_NAME
columns.description:
The member group association value for the member list.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes
